name: DCMobility
overview: DCMobility, LLC, a professional services company, engages in the development and deployment of wireless communication services, networks, and products for businesses and governments around the world. The company offers execution management services in various development areas, including product strategy, planning, and implementation; strategic analysis and program management; RFPs and proposals; system functional specifications; ICD and requirements development; test systems development; network integration and deployment; custom application development; custom application and platform development; regulatory, conformance and certification; and market research and analysis. It also provides program management services, which include strategic product planning, market analysis, product requirements, solution architecture, product launching and operationalization, and product portfolio management, as well as structural analysis of programs, dependency and relationship analysis, master schedule and tiered calendar breakdown development, contract tailoring and negotiations, progress and delivery analysis, vendor management, and customer management services. In addition, the company offers test and integration services, which include system level layout and integration, certification and regulatory conformance, interoperability testing, end-to-end testing, and core network integration and testing; and hardware and software development services, such as requirements, test case, and defect management; distributed command and control of test equipment; test equipment scripting; and distributed load testing. Its clients include traditional wireless carriers, wireless broadband service providers, OEMs and ODMs, government agencies, and universities and research institutions. The company was incorporated in 2012 and is based in McLean, Virginia.
